title: (x) Pearl Jam "Vitalogy" - hand lettered {Benjamin Shaykin}
content: It reminds me of Chuck Davis's [Denise](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125085300/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/chuckdavis/denise.shtml) at Letterhead Fonts, but it looks custom. It could be a font with swashes that has been set along a path and/or distorted too, but as usual, when there are no duplicate letters, telling if it is custom is mostly guessing.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
go to the source ...   
   
For some reason, I'm thinking Asterisk   
in Seattle, but I can't seem to track down   
a URL.
I thought it was taken from an old [book.](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125085300/http:/www.applewoodbooks.com/catalog/product_info.php/products_id/154?osCsid=bbeb7080dcc90fa24ae200c02827fe8c)

wow, you're right...I never knew the album cover was the same as this book's cover...   
   
no luck yet on getting the name of this font, though. I'll keep trying!
If this cover is faithful to the original 1899 edition, I don't think you're going to have much luck...

woo hoo!   
my very first i.d...
